node.page:
<!-- displayfull -->
[%
# Code moved to [zen e2node display page]

# Delete the VAR that brought us here:
delete $$VARS{displaypref_e2node};
# Display the node with the right htmlpage:
my $PAGE = getPage($NODE,'display') ;
parseCode($$PAGE{page}, $NODE);
%]
node.title: zen e2node displayfull page
